title: The Hotel Part 2
description: “The best sex is hotel sex…”Billionaire Dominic Rexford, CEO of the Rexford luxury hotel brand. Mysterious, controlling – and my new boss. He’s man who always gets what he wants, whether it’s in the boardroom or the bedroom.And now he wants me.But I’ve got secrets he can never know. And when his brother returns to claim his share of the company, the truth could tear all of us apart. *Part two of the sexy, scandalous new series*
author: Lola Darling
